description.en: Bookaweb.com is a portal that deals with advertising apartments and all accompanying content that the user (guest) can be informed and whose services can be booked. The portal is intended to promote and provide all kinds of information about various types of travel.
description.sr: Bookaweb.com predstavlja portal koji se bavi oglašavanjem apartmana i svih propratnih sadržaja o kojima se korisnik (gost) može informisati i čije usluge može rezervisati. Portal je namenjen promociji i pružanju svih vrsta informacija o raznim tipovima putovanja.

description.en: Learning and work on a team project, hosted by the IT Practice Center with the help of ENON Solutions. I've had great experience and learned a lot about Web Development using Vue 3, Web APIs (RESTful) and MySQL.
description.sr: Učenje i rad na projektu u timu, organizovano od strane IT Practice Centra uz pomoć kompanije ENON Solutions. Stekao sam lepo iskustvo i naučio sam osnove o razvoju web aplikacija koristeći Vue 3, Web API (RESTful) i MySQL bazu podataka.

description.en:
The beginning of my journey. Having previously worked as a baggage handler at the airport, this marked my decision to turn my dreams into goals.

Completed 1-year Microsoft Development course
Technologies: ASP.NET, MSSQL
Language: C#
Additional: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
description.sr:
Moj početak. Prethodno radeći kao rukovalac prtljagom na aerodromu, ovo je obeležilo moju odluku da svoje snove pretvorim u ciljeve.

Završen jednogodišnji Microsoft Development kurs
Tehnologije: .NET, ASP.NET, MSSQL
Jezik: C#
Dodatno: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
